= Revision 0.2.1 - Release Notice =
1st April 2009

Revision 0.2.1 is mostly a defect fix release

= Details =

 * *New Juice* - Added  `juice-0.2.1.js` 

 * *Multiple insert panels* - Fix to non-opperation ofmultiple insert panels - typo in JuiceInsert Class

 * *simpleInsertJuice Extension* - Enables simple insertion of a supplied div at a supplied insert point.  Example of extension that does not require meta to operate.
